Resource Device [Internet]. HL7 International, FHIR Specification first DSTU version (v 0.0.82). Available from: http://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/fhir/device.html [last accessed 25 Feb 2015].
Implementation Guide for CDA Release 2.0 Personal Healthcare Monitoring Report (PHMR) (International Realm) Draft Standard for Trial Use Release 1. HL7 International, 2008. Available at: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Product_CDA_R2_IG#Product_Name_-_CDA_R2_IG_PHM_Reports [last accessed 05 Mar 2015].
Guidelines for 64-bit Global Identifier (EUI-64) [Internet]. IEEE Standards Association [cited: 2015-02-25]. Available from: http://standards.ieee.org/regauth/oui/tutorials/EUI64.html [last accessed 05 Mar 2015].

details.purpose: Registrar detalles adicionales relativos a especificaciones, mantenimiento, servicio, limpieza y calibración de un dispositivo.
details.use: Utilizar para registrar detalles adicionales requeridos para suplementar al genérico CLUSTER.device o sus especializaciones. Este arquetipo focaliza en la captura de los detalles relativos al mantenimiento, limpieza, calibración y otros detalles específicos de los componentes de un dispositivo.

details.purpose: Anvendes for registrering av detaljer relatert til spesifikasjoner, vedlikehold, servicering, renhold og kalibrering av enhver enhet.
details.use: Anvendes for ytterligere registrering av nødvendige detaljer for supplere den generelle CLUSTER.device eller spesialiserte arketyper. Fokus for denne arketype er at fange opp detaljer relatert til vedlikehold, servicering, renhold, kalibrering og andre spesifikke detaljer om enhetens komponenter.

details.purpose: لتسجيل التفاصيل الإضافية المتعلقة بالمواصفات, الصيانة, التصليح, التنظيف و التعيير لأي جهيزة
details.use: يستخدم لتسجيل التفاصيل الإضافية المطلوبة لتزويد النماذج الجنيسة (غير محدودة الملكية) عنقود.جهيزة أو النماذج المخصصة. يركز هذا النموذج على التقاط التفاصيل المتعلقة بالصيانة, التصليح, التنظيف, التعيير و تفاصيل محددة حول مكونات الجهيزة

details.purpose: To record details that can be used to support asset management for any durable or persisting medical device. For example, information about: the physical location of the device; its network URL; and maintenance, service, cleaning, and calibration details.
details.use:
Use to record details about durable or persisting medical device.
This archetype is designed to be used in the 'Asset Management' SLOT within the CLUSTER.device archetypes and/or any specialisations of this archetype.
details.misuse: Not to be used outside of the CLUSTER.device archetype or its specialisations, unless there is a clear identification of the device about which the information is being recorded.

translations.author: Lars Bitsch-Larsen
Haukeland University Hospital of Bergen, Norway
translations.accreditation: MD, DEAA, MBA, spec in anesthesia, spec in tropical medicine.

translations.author: Alan March
Hospital Universitario Austral, Buenos Aires, Argentina

items.items: *Specific details that relate to asset management for any medical device that is designed for more than a single use.(en)
*May be a text string or an IEEE EUI-64 identifier.(en)
*HL7 CDA compatible representation of device manufacture details.(en)

*May be a simple string or contain simple markup e.g. for Continua PHMR reports: "Pulse Master 2000||584216|69854|2.1|1.1|1.0|" repesenting Model, Unspecified, SerialNumber, PartNumber, HardwareRevision, SoftwareRevision, ProtocolRevision, and ProdSpecGMDN.(en)
ما إذا كانت الجهيزة منظمة أو غير ذلك
التاريخ الذي تم فيه آخر مرة من الاستخدام
التاريخ الذي تم فيه آخر مرة من التعيير
تفاصيل الوكيل الذي قام بإجراء الاستخدام
تفاصيل حول المعادلات الرياضية أو الخُوارزميات التي تم استخدامها بواسطة الجهيزة من أجل توليد النتائج أو المُخْرَجات
عنصر البيانات الذي يتم حسابه أو اشتقاقه
المعادلة الريضاية التي يتم استخدامها لحساب أو اشتقاق المجال المحسوب
التاريخ الذي تم فيه آخر مرة للتنظيف أو التعقيم
*Details for human/organisation support for the medical device.(en)
*Additional information required to capture local context or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
*Specific details that relate to asset management for any medical device that is designed for more than a single use.(en)
*May be a text string or an IEEE EUI-64 identifier.(en)
*HL7 CDA compatible representation of device manufacture details.(en)

*May be a simple string or contain simple markup e.g. for Continua PHMR reports: "Pulse Master 2000||584216|69854|2.1|1.1|1.0|" repesenting Model, Unspecified, SerialNumber, PartNumber, HardwareRevision, SoftwareRevision, ProtocolRevision, and ProdSpecGMDN.(en)
El número de parte del dispositivo.
El número de revisión de hardware.
El número de revisión de protocolo.
Los límites de frecuencia de muestreo del dispositivo.
Los límites de rango del dispositivo.
Los límites de precisión del dispositivo.
Los límites de resolución del dispositivo.
Si se trata de un dispositivo regulado o no.
Fecha del último mantenimiento del dispositivo.
Fecha de la última calibración del dispositivo.
Detalles del agente que realizó el mantenimiento.
Detalles acerca de las fórmulas o algoritmos utilizados por el equipo para generar resultados/salidas.
El elemento de dato que es calculado o derivado.
Fórmula utilizada para calcular o derivar el campo calculado.
Fecha de la última limpieza o esterilización del dispositivo.
*Details for human/organisation support for the medical device.(en)
*Additional information required to capture local context or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
Specific details that relate to asset management for any medical device that is designed for more than a single use.
May be a text string or an IEEE EUI-64 identifier.
HL7 CDA compatible representation of device manufacture details.

May be a simple string or contain simple markup e.g. for Continua PHMR reports: "Pulse Master 2000||584216|69854|2.1|1.1|1.0|" repesenting Model, Unspecified, SerialNumber, PartNumber, HardwareRevision, SoftwareRevision, ProtocolRevision, and ProdSpecGMDN.
The part number of the device.
The sampling frequency limits of the device.
The range limits of the device.
The accuracy limits of the device.
The resolution limits of the device.
Whether device is regulated or otherwise.
The date the device was last serviced.
Date the device was last calibrated.
Details of agent who performed the servicing.
Details about formulae or algorithms used by the device in order to generate results/output.
Data element which is calculated or derived.
Formula used to calculate or derive the Calculated field.
Date the device was last cleaned or sterilized.
Organisation responsible for the medical device.
Physical location where device is kept.
Network address to contact the device.
Details for human/organisation support for the medical device.
Additional information required to capture local context or to align with other reference models/formalisms.
*Specific details that relate to asset management for any medical device that is designed for more than a single use.(en)
*May be a text string or an IEEE EUI-64 identifier.(en)
*HL7 CDA compatible representation of device manufacture details.(en)

*May be a simple string or contain simple markup e.g. for Continua PHMR reports: "Pulse Master 2000||584216|69854|2.1|1.1|1.0|" repesenting Model, Unspecified, SerialNumber, PartNumber, HardwareRevision, SoftwareRevision, ProtocolRevision, and ProdSpecGMDN.(en)
Om bruken av enheten er regulert ved lov eller ei.
Dato for siste gang enheten ble servicert.
Dato for siste gang enheten ble kalibrert.
Detaljer om den organisasjon eller agent som utførte serviceringen.
Detaljer om formler eller algoritmer som anvendes av enheten for at oppnå resultater.
Data elementer som beregnes eller avledes.
Formelen som anvendes eller avledes i beregnings feltet.
Dato for siste renhold eller sterilisering.
*Details for human/organisation support for the medical device.(en)
*Additional information required to capture local context or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
